title: Energy Healing with Susan Horn
description: OT Just For Kids | Occupational Therapist for kids with Sensory Processing Disorder. Helping kids with the specific skills and tools to be successful in life.
cleaned_text: Energy Healing Modalities Individual Sessions Tailored to You! Energy Healing Techniques include Reiki, Mindfulness, NLP, Sound vibrations using Tibetan Singing Bowls, Tingsha Chimes, Drumming, Meditation, Affirmations, Smudging, Cultivation of Self Esteem and more. Family Mindfulness Sessions Tailored to Your Family Per appointment time and day that works best for your family
